commenti.body:
why do you wanna go if you’ve heard bad things?

I haven’t had any bad experience there ever
Jasna is cool, give it a shot. But maybe pre game before, the bar has at least German prices
I also heard that it's one the best techno clubs in warsaw but foreigners aren't as accepted just wanted to check

It's the best techno club in the city imo. As a foreigner, I can easily say the things you have heard about Jasna 1 are not true. I could always enter there, saw zero aggression from the bouncers there, and I've been there plenty of times. 

Go check there and I hope you will enjoy your night there.
